resources.string: Rectangle is a customers\' top-notch view, due to it\'s multiple usage cases.
Square - quite perfect in its simplicity, may be applied when needed and when not.
Triangle\'s strength might actually come from non-trivial fact of possessing exactly three sides.
Ellipse is a lightweight equivalent of circle, with slight performance bonuses.
Segment limits itself to kinda one dimensional space, which comes at some cost and with limited benefits.
Circle\'s attracts many customers\' view due to its well-rounded properties.
